name: Blacksmith's master (Alpha)
description:
Blacksmith's master (WIP)

Try to become a really great blacksmitsh's master in this little puzzle game.

Place the ingots, swipe the pieses of steel, delete all excess cubes and you will create a really epic weapons

Alpha version.

Control: 

1. Drag&Drop for moving ingot. Double click for placing.

2. Mouse swipes or WASD for the moving cubes, and double click for delete it. 

But remember: move first, than delete.

Have fun, and enjoy it!

Soloma Games.
